message: The QUALITY_ASSURE field for indicator 16-3-3, translated into all languages

data.en: It is recommended that NSOs serve as the main contact for compiling and quality assuring the necessary data to report on SDG 16.3.3, in close coordination with Ministries of Justice and/or other relevant bodies in the country. Automated and substantive validation procedures are in place when data are processed by custodian agencies to assess their consistency and compliance with standards.
